name: Eldritch Execution (Mushrooman)
description:
Eldritch Execution is an Isometric shooter where the player has to fight through hoards of enemies while trying to activate a portal.

Controls: 

Movement: WASD

Shooting: Mouse

Dodge: Shift

Credits:

Art: Johnny McConnell

Programming: Spencer Caro & Sebastian Londono

Music/Audio: Spencer Caro
